entity.name: Tipping Point
entity.description: The daytime game show, presented by Ben Shephard, features contestants getting a chance to play a large coin-drop machine, provided they answer questions correctly. Wrong answers and the players could be eliminated. The last contestant standing has an opportunity to win the machine's £10,000 jackpot.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

text: So schools may not even re-open fully in September. Are we as a nation just going to sit back and accept this? Watch the life chances of deprived children being casually destroyed? Or is this a tipping point? Autumn term must not be sacrificed on the corona pyre!
